name: date_created
description: The timestamp for when the conversation was created

name: date_updated
description: The timestamp for when the conversation was last updated

name: platform
description: On which platform did the conversation take place

name: is_engaged
description: Did the chatter send at least one message to start the conversation after a greeting was served by Ada

name: is_escalated
description: Did the chatter handoff to an integrated CX platform, an email ticket, or otherwise escalate to an agent

name: csat
description: A JSON object converted to STRING. The associated CSAT score for the conversation

fields.name: browser
fields.description: The type of browser used when accessing the chatbot

fields.name: chattertoken
fields.description: The token assigned to the chatter

fields.name: created
fields.description: The epoch unix time stamp of chat creation

fields.name: initialurl
fields.description: The URL the user came from

fields.name: last_answer_id
fields.description: The ID of the last answer sent by the bot

fields.name: last_question_asked
fields.description: The content of the last question asked by the user

fields.name: user_agent
fields.description: The User-Agent request header of the requesting user agent.

fields.name: domain_name
fields.description: The domain the user is coming from

fields.name: lob
fields.description: The line of business the user is coming from

fields.name: order_number
fields.description: The order number that the user is getting the chatbot's help with

name: conversation_obj
description: A JSON object converted to STRING. The entire Conversation Object as a string
